channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Voici deux manettes pour améliorer l’ergonomie la Switch 2 en mode console portable
item.description: Parmi les accessoires autour de la Nintendo Switch 2, plusieurs projets Kickstarter fourmillent. L'Abxylute N6 et N9C sont deux modèles de manettes au format « dock » pour la console de Nintendo.

item.title: The best VPN deals: Up to 87 percent off ProtonVPN, Surfshark, ExpressVPN, NordVPN and more
item.description: The Winter Olympics have been a blast so far, and there are still four days left. It's the perfect time to get ahold of a virtual private network (VPN) and check out how the games are broadcast in other countries— all while improving your cybersecurity. By connecting to a VPN every time you get online, you can keep your activity hidden from your ISP and anyone to whom it may sell that data, while streaming sports and TV from across the globe. We strongly recommend using a VPN, but shopping for one takes some care. If you jump on the very first deal you see, you might get stuck with a substand...

item.title: A ‘Spider-Man: Brand New Day’ Book Just Accidentally Told Us What the Film Is About
item.description: We have yet to see a trailer for the Tom Holland Marvel sequel, but we now have an official synopsis.

item.title: Écouteurs à clip d’oreille : quand le confort prend le pas sur le son
item.description: Rester à l’écoute du monde sans renoncer à la musique, voilà la promesse des écouteurs ouverts à clip d’oreille qui se multiplient ces derniers mois. Après plusieurs tests, une évidence s’impose : ces produits sont d’abord des outils de confort et de sécurité, bien plus que des instruments de haute fidélité. On fait le point.

item.title: Google Launches Music Generation Model to Make Songs 30-Seconds at a Time
item.description: Because actually making art is for suckers.

item.title: Alibaba's Qwen 3.5 397B-A17 beats its larger trillion-parameter model — at a fraction of the cost
item.description: Alibaba dropped Qwen3.5 earlier this week, timed to coincide with the Lunar New Year, and the headline numbers alone are enough to make enterprise AI buyers stop and pay attention.The new flagship open-weight model — Qwen3.5-397B-A17B — packs 397 billion total parameters but activates only 17 billion per token. It is claiming benchmark wins against Alibaba's own previous flagship, Qwen3-Max, a model the company itself has acknowledged exceeded one trillion parameters. The release marks a meaningful moment in enterprise AI procurement. For IT leaders evaluating AI infrastructure for 2026, Qwen ...

item.title: Amazon halts Blue Jay robotics project after less than six months
item.description: Amazon said Blue Jay's core tech will be used for other robotics projects and the employees who worked on it were moved to other projects.

item.title: Mastodon, a decentralized alternative to X, plans to target creators with new features
item.description: Mastodon is looking to grow its open source, decentralized social network with new features aimed at creators.

item.title: Data breach at fintech giant Figure affects close to a million customers
item.description: The Figure data breach allowed hackers to steal customer names, dates of birth, physical addresses, phone numbers, and email addresses.

item.title: Les données de 1,2 million de comptes bancaires français ont été piratées
item.description: Le fichier national des comptes bancaires (FICOBA), qui recense tous les comptes ouverts en France, a subi une fuite de données.Depuis fin janvier 2026, un pirate a consulté les données de 1,2 million de comptes, dont le RIB et l'IBAN. L'attaquant a profité des identifiants volés d'un fonctionnaire et de l'absence d'authentification à deux facteurs pour arriver à ses fins......

item.description: How to watch ice hockey for free. Live stream USA vs. Sweden in men's ice hockey for free from anywhere in the world.

item.title: Microsoft is bringing a built-in network speed test to Windows 11
item.description: Microsoft is working on a bunch of new features for Windows 11, including a new network speed test that you can access from your taskbar. The tool is bundled in an update rolling out to Windows 11 Insiders in the Release Preview Channel, allowing you to right-click the network icon in the system tray to […]

item.title: World Labs lands $1B, with $200M from Autodesk, to bring world models into 3D workflows
item.description: The partnership will see the two companies exploring how World Labs’ models can work alongside Autodesk’s tools, and vice versa, starting with a focus on entertainment use cases.

item.title: OpenAI must stop using ‘Cameo’ term in Sora app, judge rules
item.description: A judge has sided with Cameo, the company that sells custom celebrity videos, over OpenAI in the battle for the term "Cameo."

item.title: Good Luck Banning Smart Glasses
item.description: Smart glasses bans are reasonable, important, and damn near impossible.

item.title: Abxylute promises 'deep customization' for its newly announced 'deck-style' controllers — they look impressive, but they'll also be going head-to-head our most anticipated Switch 2 accessory
item.description: Abxylute announces N6 and N9C 'deck-style' controllers for Switch 2, but I think they'll have some stiff competition with the Nitro Deck 2 arriving soon.

item.title: My favorite business mini PC tackles AI and 3D modeling with ease — and Lenovo just cut the price by $528
item.description: Specced for heavier workloads, this Lenovo mini PC packs a Core Ultra 5 CPU and RTX 5060 GPU.

item.title: Nevada sues Kalshi for operating a sports gambling market without a license
item.description: Nevada is taking action against the rapidly growing Wild West of prediction markets. The state's gambling regulators and attorney general sued Kalshi on Tuesday. They accuse the company of bypassing Nevada law by operating a sports gambling market without proper licenses. In addition, they say Kalshi provides services to individuals under 21, which violates state law.The lawsuit follows a federal appeals court’s rejection of Kalshi's request to prevent the state from pursuing legal action. And it comes a day after the Trump administration claimed that only the federal government has the right ...

item.title: Adieu les fils encombrants avec ce chargeur sans fil Qi2 2-en-1 compatible Magsafe et Pixelsnap en promo à moins de 30 €
item.description: Amazon propose une vente flash sur le Ugreen Zapix W710, un chargeur sans fil 2-en-1 pour les smartphones Apple et Google, ce qui le place à 29,99 euros au lieu de 45,99 euros.

item.title: Chinese Kung-Fu Robots Put Western Efforts to Shame
item.description: Whirling nunchaku-wielding dervishes of destruction represent startling progress for China's robotics industry.

item.title: Magic Mushroom Ingredient Passes Major Test, Paving Way for FDA Approval
item.description: In two large-scale trials, Compass Pathways' proprietary form of psilocybin improved people's depression symptoms better than controls.

item.title: Ken Watanabe didn’t think a kabuki movie would work
item.description: A three-hour-long period drama about kabuki, a centuries-old form of Japanese theater, doesn't exactly sound like box office gold. But that's exactly what happened with Kokuho. Director Lee Sang-il's adaptation of the Shuichi Yoshida novel of the same name was a surprise hit last year, becoming Japan's top-grossing live-action film domestically. But star Ken Watanabe […]...

item.title: Ikea is expanding again. The full list of new store cities is finally out
item.description: Ikea plans to open 10 new U.S. locations in 2026, with stores spread across seven states and three landing in Texas alone. Ikea plans to open even more new stores this year. On Wednesday, the Swedish furniture retailer released its 2025 Annual Summary, which included plans to open four new locations. Ikea previously announced plans to open six new stores, bringing the new total for openings slated in 2026 to 10. ...

item.title: Here's what to expect at Apple's product launch event on March 4
item.description: Apple has scheduled a product launch event, dubbed an "Apple Experience", for March 4 at 9AM ET. The company is reportedly holding this event in NYC, London and Shanghai. Everyone loves shiny new products, so what can we expect to see at Apple's first launch event of 2026? We don't know anything for certain, but we have plenty of educated guesses that have been sourced from industry reports and speculation from analysts. Budget-Friendly MacBook There have been rumors swirling that Apple is preparing to launch a cheaper alternative to the MacBook Air. Bloomberg reported on this all the way back...

item.title: Microsoft veut conserver nos données pendant 10 000 ans dans du verre
item.description: Les têtes bien faites du labo de recherche de Microsoft planchent depuis quelques années sur le « projet Silica » : le stockage de données sur verre, un matériau qui peut préserver l'information pendant 10 000 ans. Le groupe a publié de nouvelles avancées notables pour réduire le coût de ce système de stockage inédit.

item.title: Plus puissante qu’une Porsche, moins chère qu’une Tesla : on a testé la Xiaomi SU7 Ultra électrique de 1500 ch
item.description: J'ai eu l'opportunité de conduire la Xiaomi SU7 Ultra en Chine. Derrière ce nom qui fleure bon le smartphone haut de gamme se cache une véritable bête de course électrique, plus performante qu'une Porsche ou qu'une Tesla. Mais que vaut vraiment cette berline de 1500 chevaux au quotidien ? Nous l'avons testé en Chine, et voici notre avis.

item.title: PC Gaming on Macs Is About to Become Very Real, but Not Thanks to Apple
item.description: We may not have to wait on Apple anymore.

item.title: What business students learn about ethics in a Philadelphia soup kitchen
item.description: I felt it was important to give students the opportunity to consider important issues of social justice when applying their business decision-making skills. For the past decade I have volunteered at St. Francis Inn, a soup kitchen in the Kensington neighborhood of Philadelphia.

item.title: How to get the free Lego set for late February: Spend $100 to get the absurdly cute Duck Family
item.description: Spend $100 on the Lego website by Feb. 24, including preordering New Pokémon and Lego Star Wars sets dropping through March 1.

item.title: Viral sleuths are turning the Nancy Guthrie case into content
item.description: True-crime enthusiasts are spreading theories, chasing clout, and complicating an active missing-person investigation. The Nancy Guthrie investigation is now in its third week, which means it was only a matter of time before the case piqued the interest of online armchair detectives.
